name: Candy Craving - 21/22 Y1D - Team 4
description:
Candy Craving

is a puzzle game where your goal is to eat all the cute little candies.

Lechomp is hungry... and these candies running around look mighty appetizing.
Solve cool puzzles to trap the candies and devour them.

Controls

WASD: Walking
Space: picking up/dropping candy
